description: Try our easy to follow Beef & Vegetable Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beef pie,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Mushroom,Father's Day,High protein,High fibre,Mince,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Beef & Vegetable Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 sheet frozen readyrolled puff pastry, just thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Heat oil in a large nonstick frying pan over high heat.
Add mince, mushroom, carrot and garlic. Cook for 5 minutes or until mince has browned. Stir in flour.
Gradually add stock, stirring constantly, and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until mixture thickens. Stir in peas.

Transfer mixture to a 1 cupcapacity ramekin dish. Using a large round cutter, cut out 4 pastry rounds. Top pies with pastry and trim any excess. Place ramekins on a baking tray. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Serve.
